Levqor Press Kit


Last Updated: November 6, 2025


Product Overview


Name: Levqor

Tagline: Automation that runs itself

Website: https://app.levqor.ai

Category: AI Automation & Job Orchestration


One-Liner

Production-ready job orchestration API that turns AI automation from a prototype into a reliable product—no DevOps team required.


Elevator Pitch (50 words)

Levqor is an AI automation platform built for builders who want to ship fast without building infrastructure. Deploy workflows in minutes with built-in connectors (Gmail, Slack, Notion, Telegram), enterprise security, and autonomous monitoring. Skip the ops, ship the features.


Full Description (150 words)

Levqor eliminates the operational complexity of AI automation. Instead of spending weeks building job queues, retry logic, monitoring, and connector integrations, developers get a production-ready API that handles everything.


The platform includes:

  • **Built-in Connectors**: Gmail, Notion, Slack, Telegram with OAuth managed for you
  • **Enterprise Security**: API key authentication, rate limiting, CORS, security headers
  • **Autonomous Monitoring**: Health checks, metrics tracking, automated backups
  • **Developer Experience**: RESTful API, comprehensive docs, OpenAPI spec

Levqor is perfect for AI startups building agent workflows, SaaS companies adding automation, and developers who want to focus on product features instead of infrastructure. From MVP to production in hours, not weeks.



Brand Assets


Brand Colors


Primary Palette:

  • **Levqor Blue**: `#0066cc` (Primary brand color)
  • **Dark Blue**: `#0052a3` (Hover states)
  • **Success Green**: `#4caf50`
  • **Error Red**: `#d32f2f`

Neutral Palette:

  • **Text Dark**: `#333333`
  • **Text Medium**: `#666666`
  • **Text Light**: `#999999`
  • **Border**: `#e0e0e0`
  • **Background**: `#f9f9f9`
  • **White**: `#ffffff`

Typography


Primary Font: System UI (Inter, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI)

Headings: 700 weight (Bold)

Body: 400 weight (Regular)

Buttons: 600 weight (Semi-bold)


Logo Usage


Wordmark: "Levqor" in Levqor Blue (#0066cc), 700 weight

Minimum Size: 100px width

Clear Space: Minimum 20px around logo

Don'ts: Do not stretch, rotate, or change colors without approval

Public Health Metrics

  • System Status: `https://api.levqor.ai/public/metrics`
  • 99.99% uptime, real-time availability


Key Features


For Developers

  • RESTful API with JSON responses
  • Comprehensive documentation
  • Built-in rate limiting and authentication
  • OpenAPI specification
  • Webhook support

For Product Teams

  • No-code connector setup
  • Real-time monitoring dashboard
  • Usage analytics and metrics
  • Automated backup system
  • SOC 2 ready security

Built-in Connectors

1. Gmail - Email automation and management

2. Notion - Database and document workflows

3. Slack - Team communication automation

4. Telegram - Bot and messaging workflows



Technical Specifications


Architecture:

  • Backend: Flask (Python)
  • Database: SQLite with WAL mode
  • Deployment: Replit Autoscale
  • CDN: Global edge network

Security:

  • API key authentication with rotation
  • HTTPS/TLS 1.3 encryption
  • Rate limiting (per-IP and global)
  • CORS configuration
  • Security headers (HSTS, CSP, COOP, COEP)
  • Input validation and sanitization

Reliability:

  • 99.99% uptime SLA
  • Automated daily backups
  • Health monitoring endpoints
  • Graceful error handling
  • Request timeout protection


Pricing


Starter: Free

  • 1,000 jobs/month
  • All connectors
  • Community support

Professional: $49/month

  • 10,000 jobs/month
  • Priority support
  • Advanced analytics
  • Custom rate limits

Enterprise: Custom

  • Unlimited jobs
  • Dedicated support
  • Custom SLA
  • On-premise option

Founded: 2025

Team Size: Stealth mode

Funding: Bootstrapped

Boilerplate


Short (50 words):

Levqor is a production-ready job orchestration platform for AI automation. Built for developers who want to ship fast, it provides enterprise-grade infrastructure with built-in connectors, security, and monitoring—no DevOps required.


Medium (100 words):

Levqor eliminates the operational complexity of AI automation by providing a production-ready job orchestration API. Developers get enterprise-grade infrastructure out of the box: built-in connectors for Gmail, Slack, Notion, and Telegram; comprehensive security with API keys and rate limiting; autonomous monitoring with health checks and backups. Instead of spending weeks building infrastructure, teams can deploy workflows in minutes and focus on product features. From MVP to production in hours, not weeks.


Long (200 words):

Levqor is transforming how developers build AI automation by eliminating infrastructure complexity. The platform provides a production-ready job orchestration API that handles everything modern automation needs: built-in connectors, enterprise security, and autonomous monitoring.


Traditional automation platforms require weeks of DevOps work to implement job queues, retry logic, connector integrations, and monitoring systems. Levqor ships with all of this built-in, allowing developers to deploy production workflows in minutes instead of months.


The platform includes managed connectors for Gmail, Notion, Slack, and Telegram—with OAuth and API keys handled automatically. Enterprise security features include API key authentication with zero-downtime rotation, comprehensive rate limiting, CORS configuration, and security headers that meet SOC 2 requirements.


Autonomous monitoring provides real-time health checks, usage analytics, and automated daily backups. Developers get detailed metrics without setting up observability infrastructure.


Levqor is perfect for AI startups building agent workflows, SaaS companies adding automation features, and developers who want to focus on product innovation instead of operational complexity. The platform scales from MVP to production, supporting thousands of jobs per month with 99.99% uptime reliability.
